sqlMap.select: select z.* from (select rownum rnum, y.* from (select a.issue_code, a.issue_name, a.issue_event_day, b.islev_name, c.emp_name, d.project_name, a.emp_damdang from issue a, islev b, emp c, project d, pw e where a.issue_level= b.islev_code and a.emp_code = c.emp_code and a.PW_CODE = e.PW_CODE and e.PROJECT_CODE = d.project_code and to_char(add_months(sysdate,-1),'yyyy-mm-dd')<=a.issue_event_day and a.issue_alarm = 'n' and a.emp_damdang = #emp_code# group by a.issue_code, a.issue_name, a.issue_event_day, b.islev_name, c.emp_name, d.project_name, a.emp_damdang order by a.issue_event_day ) y ) z order by z.rnum desc

select count(a.issue_code) from issue a, islev b, emp c, project d, pw e where a.issue_level= b.islev_code and a.emp_code = c.emp_code and a.PW_CODE = e.PW_CODE and e.PROJECT_CODE = d.project_code and to_char(add_months(sysdate,-1),'yyyy-mm-dd')<=a.issue_event_day and a.issue_alarm = 'n' and a.emp_damdang = #emp_code#
sqlMap.update: update issue set issue_alarm ='y' where issue_code = #issue_code#
sqlMap.select: select count(a.feedback_code) from feedback a, emp b, pw c where a.send_emp = b.emp_code and a.pw_code = c.pw_code and a.receive_emp = #emp_code# and a.feedback_st > to_char(sysdate - 14, 'yyyymmdd') and a.receive_delete ='n'

select z.* from (select rownum rnum, y.* from( select a.feedback_code, a.feedback_content, b.emp_name, c.pw_function, a.feedback_st, d.project_name, a.feedback_alarm from feedback a, emp b, pw c, project d where a.send_emp = b.emp_code and a.pw_code = c.pw_code and a.receive_emp = #emp_code# and c.project_code = d.project_code and a.receive_delete ='n' and a.feedback_st > to_char(sysdate - 14, 'YYYYMMDD') group by a.feedback_content, b.emp_name, c.pw_function, a.feedback_st, a.feedback_code, d.project_name,a.feedback_alarm order by a.feedback_st ) y ) z order by z.rnum desc

select count(a.feedback_code) from feedback a, emp b, pw c where a.send_emp = b.emp_code and a.pw_code = c.pw_code and a.send_emp = #emp_code# and a.feedback_st > to_char(sysdate -14, 'yyyymmdd') and a.send_delete ='n'

select z.* from (select rownum rnum, y.* from( select a.feedback_code, a.feedback_content, b.emp_name , a.receive_emp, c.pw_function, a.feedback_st, d.project_name ,a.feedback_alarm from feedback a, emp b, pw c, project d where a.receive_emp = b.emp_code and a.pw_code = c.pw_code and a.send_emp = #emp_code# and c.project_code = d.project_code and a.send_delete ='n' and a.feedback_st >to_char(sysdate - 14, 'YYYYMMDD') group by a.feedback_code, a.feedback_content, b.emp_name , a.receive_emp, c.pw_function, a.feedback_st, d.project_name, a.feedback_alarm order by a.feedback_st ) y ) z order by z.rnum desc

select count(a.video_chat_room_code) from video_chat_room a, video_chat_join b, emp c, project d where a.video_chat_room_code = b.video_chat_room_code and a.emp_code = c.emp_code and a.project_code = d.project_code and b.emp_code = #emp_code# and b.video_chat_join_sign ='n' and to_char(a.video_chat_room_date, 'yyyymmdd hh24:mi:ss') > to_char(sysdate-2/24, 'yyyymmdd hh24:mi:ss') and a.emp_code != b.emp_code

select z.* from (select rownum rnum, y.* from( select a.video_chat_room_code, d.project_name, c.emp_name, a.video_chat_room_date, a.video_chat_room_url, b.video_chat_join_code, a.emp_code from video_chat_room a, video_chat_join b, emp c, project d where a.video_chat_room_code = b.video_chat_room_code and a.emp_code = c.emp_code and a.project_code = d.project_code and b.emp_code = #emp_code# and b.video_chat_join_sign ='n' and to_char(a.video_chat_room_date, 'yyyymmdd hh24:mi:ss') > to_char(sysdate-2/24, 'yyyymmdd hh24:mi:ss') and a.emp_code != b.emp_code and a.video_chat_level_code != 'level4' group by d.project_name, c.emp_name, a.video_chat_room_date, a.video_chat_room_code, a.video_chat_room_url, b.video_chat_join_code, a.emp_code ) y ) z order by z.rnum desc

SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT A.PROJECT_CODE ,A.PROJECT_NAME ,TO_CHAR(A.PROJECT_START, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PROJECT_START ,TO_CHAR(SUGGEST_COST,'L9,999,999,999,999') AS SUGGEST_COST ,D.RQPPS_NOTICE_AGENCY ,B.JOIN_ALARM ,D.RQPPS_NICKNAME ,B.JOIN_CODE ,D.RQPPS_CODE ,D.EMP_CODE as emp_code_pm FROM PROJECT A, JOIN B, RQPPS D, SUGGEST E, EMP C WHERE A.PROJECT_DELETE = 'n' AND B.PROJECT_CODE = A.PROJECT_CODE AND A.SUGGEST_CODE = E.SUGGEST_CODE AND D.RQPPS_CODE = E.RQPPS_CODE AND D.EMP_CODE = C.EMP_CODE AND B.JOIN_ALARM = 'y' AND B.EMP_CODE = #emp_code# ORDER BY PROJECT_CODE) A ) B ORDER BY B.RNUM DESC

SELECT COUNT(A.PROJECT_CODE) FROM PROJECT A, JOIN B, RQPPS D, SUGGEST E WHERE A.PROJECT_DELETE = 'n' AND B.PROJECT_CODE = A.PROJECT_CODE AND A.SUGGEST_CODE = E.SUGGEST_CODE AND D.RQPPS_CODE = E.RQPPS_CODE AND B.JOIN_ALARM = 'y' AND B.EMP_CODE = #emp_code#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE JOIN SET JOIN_ALARM = 'n' WHERE JOIN_CODE = #join_code#
sqlMap.select: SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT TO_NUMBER(A.ISSUE_CODE) AS ISSUE_CODE ,A.ISSUE_ALARM ,TO_CHAR(issue_event_day, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as issue_event_day ,A.ISSUE_NAME ,B.ISLEV_NAME AS ISSUE_LEVEL ,A.EMP_DAMDANG ,A.EMP_CODE ,C.EMP_NAME ,D.PROJECT_NAME ,F.RQPPS_NICKNAME FROM ISSUE A, ISLEV B, EMP C, PROJECT D, PW E, RQPPS F, SUGGEST G WHERE A.ISSUE_LEVEL = B.ISLEV_CODE AND A.EMP_CODE = C.EMP_CODE AND A.PW_CODE = E.PW_CODE AND D.PROJECT_CODE = E.PROJECT_CODE AND F.RQPPS_CODE = G.SUGGEST_CODE AND D.SUGGEST_CODE = G.SUGGEST_CODE AND A.ISSUE_ALARM = 'n' AND A.EMP_DAMDANG = 'n' AND A.ISSUE_DELETE = 'n' AND F.EMP_CODE = #emp_code# ORDER BY ISSUE_CODE) A ) B ORDER BY B.RNUM DESC

SELECT COUNT(ISSUE_CODE) FROM ISSUE A, ISLEV B, EMP C, PROJECT D, PW E, RQPPS F, SUGGEST G WHERE A.ISSUE_LEVEL = B.ISLEV_CODE AND A.EMP_CODE = C.EMP_CODE AND A.PW_CODE = E.PW_CODE AND D.PROJECT_CODE = E.PROJECT_CODE AND F.RQPPS_CODE = G.SUGGEST_CODE AND D.SUGGEST_CODE = G.SUGGEST_CODE AND A.ISSUE_ALARM = 'n' AND A.EMP_DAMDANG = 'n' AND A.ISSUE_DELETE = 'n' AND F.EMP_CODE = #emp_code#
